items.title: Bessent Plans to Attend Tariff Arguments at the Supreme Court
items.summary: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent dismissed the idea that his presence could be seen as an attempt to intimidate the court on a case that President Trump considers vital to his economic policy.

items.title: New Jersey Elections: How to Vote, Where to Vote and What’s on the Ballot
items.summary: New Jersey voters will pick a governor on Tuesday in a competitive off-year election.

items.title: Elections to Play Out Amid Tensions Over ICE and Justice Dept. Monitors
items.summary: Democrats are concerned that the immigration crackdown will hurt Latino turnout on Tuesday, and that election monitors at polling sites could intimidate voters.

items.title: In the Virginia governor’s race, it’s Abigail Spanberger vs. Winsome Earle-Sears.
items.summary: Ms. Spanberger, a centrist Democrat, has led in most polls against Ms. Earle-Searles, the Republican lieutenant governor. One of them will become Virginia’s first female chief executive.

items.title: Dick Cheney, Powerful Vice President and Washington Insider, Dies at 84
items.summary: A former defense secretary and congressman, he held the nation’s No. 2 job under President George W. Bush and was an architect of policies in an era of war and economic change.

items.title: Virginia Elections: How to Vote, Where to Vote and What’s on the Ballot
items.summary: Virginia voters will make their choice for governor and attorney general on Tuesday, and all 100 seats in the House of Delegates are also on the ballot.

items.title: US elections 2025 live: Americans go to the polls, with elections in New York City, New Jersey, Virginia and California
items.summary: <p>Attention in US and abroad will be on New York mayoral race with Democratic candidate Zohran Mamdani facing Andrew Cuomo and Curtis Sliwa</p><p>The former US vice-president, <strong>Dick Cheney</strong>, has died aged 84, according to a family statement.</p><p>“Richard B. Cheney, the 46th Vice President of the United States, died last night, November 3, 2025. He was 84 years old,” Cheney’s family said in a statement quoted by The Hill and other media outlets.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/live/2025/nov/04/us-elections-2025-live-new-york-city-new-jersey-virginia-california-latest-news-updates-live">Continue reading...</a>

items.title: Dick Cheney, vice-president and giant of Republican politics, dies aged 84
items.summary: <p>Cheney, who served under presidents from Nixon to George W Bush, will be remembered for key role after 9/11</p><p>The former White House chief of staff, member of Congress, secretary of defense and US vice-president Dick Cheney has died, his family has said. He was 84.</p><p>Cheney was one of the country’s most powerful vice-presidents, widely reported to wield great influence over the less experienced George W Bush, the president under whom he served.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/nov/04/dick-cheney-vice-president-republican-bush-dies">Continue reading...</a>
